pages.text: The $(major)DNA Decryptor/$ uses FE to decrypt $(l:geneticsresequenced:items/dna_helix)DNA Helices/$.$(br2)Every time DNA is decrypted, it will choose a weighted-random $(l:geneticsresequenced:genes)Gene/$, based on the Entity the Helix came from. This Gene is chosen at the start of the process.
If the DNA Helix in the output slot is of a different Gene, you'll have to remove it for the Decryptor to work.
